page.title: 06Ghosts
page.content: Many people in this area believe in {Ghosts}or at least like to hear ghost stories. However there are very few stories about them. It is said that an apparition of a coach drives up and down the Milton Road and a phantom horse rider gallops around the countryside at Bretby. Local folklore says that in the grounds of the Vicarage at Repton, {St.Wiscott}and his devout followers lies buried amoungst the burial mounds of the Vikings (which have been dug up recently). Some older inhabitants of Repton tell of a wealthy woman who was haunted for the rest of her life by the spirit of a servant she had unjustly dismissed and who had subsequently died of a broken heart.
